title: 'This is the biggest UFO bombshell of 2026': Retired colonel testimony points to secret non-human recovery mission in Brazil
description: New details from alleged eyewitnesses have been revealed about a shocking UFO crash landing 30 years ago.

title: Reinstate UAP teachers immediately
description: The University Teachers’ Network and rights organisation Naripokkho yesterday demanded the immediate reinstatement of two University of Asia Pacific (UAP) faculty members, accusing the authorities of succumbing to mob pressure.

title: US Military UFO Probe: Experts Reveal Secret Hangar Housing 'Non-Human' Aircraft
description: Experts and former intelligence officials claim a US naval base may house 'non human' aircraft as part of a secret UFO investigation, despite repeated Pentagon denials.

title: Teachers’ Network demands reinstatement of dismissed UAP faculty members
description: The University Teachers’ Network has demanded the immediate reinstatement of two faculty members dismissed from the University of Asia Pacific (UAP), alleging that the decision was influenced by a “mob” and violated academic freedom.The demand was made during a press conference at the National Press Club on Wednesday, organized in protest against the dismissal of Laika Bashir, assistant...Details

title: Who Is Bob Lazar? The UFO Whistleblower Who Claims He Worked on Alien Craft at Area 51
description: Bob Lazar claims he worked on alien spacecraft at Area 51, but his story remains one of the most divisive in UFO history.
